tool_description: Organizes and formats wishlist items for optimal display with sorting, grouping, and visual arrangement options.

display_mode.description: Display arrangement: grid, list, compact, detailed

group_by.description: Grouping criteria: category, price_range, date_added, priority, none

items_per_page.description: Number of items to display per page (10-100)

error_messages: Invalid display mode: Use one of [grid, list, compact, detailed].
Invalid grouping criteria: Use one of [category, price_range, date_added, priority, none].
Invalid items per page: Must be between 10 and 100.
Empty wishlist: No items available to organize for display.
usage: Provide user_id to organize their wishlist display. Choose display_mode, grouping criteria, and pagination settings to customize the presentation format.

organized_items.description: Array of item IDs in display order

display_groups.description: Array of group names if grouping is applied

total_pages.description: Total number of pages for pagination

display_metadata.description: JSON string containing display configuration and formatting information
